section.title: &PRODUCT; 2.2.9
section.para: &PRODUCT; 2.2.9 - OSS was not released due to a number of install bugs discovered post-release.

row.entry: A limitation on the number of templates per zone (roughly 300) has been removed.
CloudStack has seen significant performance improvement that now allows it to manage up to 20,000 physical hosts.
If a secondary storage unmount fails, the CloudStack will no longer delete secondary storage contents
Under some error circumstances, it was possible for VMs to transition to the Error state incorrectly. This could lead to the erroneous deletion of the VMs. This has been fixed.

section.title: New features in &PRODUCT; 2.2.9
section.para: There are no new features in CloudStack 2.2.9
